entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bonaventure
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
